content: switch to smaller needle * - repeat what is shown after decrease round k1 p1 k2tog p1 ssk p1 k1 p1 x 10 - repeat what is shown between 80 sts bor - beginning of round cn - cable needle ribbing co - cast on rounds 1 & 2 k1 p1 x 40 k - knit k2tog - knit two together bind off kfb - knit front & back bobble all stitches in pattern using larger needle break yarn lh - left hand and pull tail through remaining bobble loop mm - millimeter/s p - purl finishing ssk - slip slip knit weave in ends and block headband st/s - stitch/es winter dreamer headband ~ ©2024 ~ all rights reserved ~ kalurah hudson ~ whiletheyplaydesigns com ~ page 2 chart-reader instructions chart read all row from right to left pattern work each 10 stitch repeat 10 times in every round note hold both yarns together throughout entire headband with smaller needle co 80 using longtail cast on join in the round and place bor marker ribbing rounds 1-4 k1 p1 x 40 work should measure 1 /2 5 cm from co switch to larger needle increase round k1 kfb k1 p1 x 20 100 sts work rounds 1-16 of chart once switch to smaller needle decrease round k1 p1 k2tog p1 ssk p1 k1 p1 x 10 80 sts ribbing rounds 1 & 2 k1 p1 x 40 bind off bobble all stitches in pattern using larger needle break yarn and pull tail through remaining bobble loop finishing weave in ends and block headband key winter dreamer headband ~ ©2024 ~ all rights reserved ~ kalurah hudson ~ whiletheyplaydesigns com ~ page 3 winter dreamer headband ~ ©2024 ~ all rights reserved ~ kalurah hudson ~ whiletheyplaydesigns com ~ page 4
